column1: 1\1\Step by step and the thing is done. Charles Atlas
1\2\A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did. John Burroughs

column3: It always seems impossible until it’s done. Nelson Mandela
A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week. George S. Patton
Motivation will almost always beat mere talent. Norman Ralph Augustine
Either I will find a way or I will make one. Philip Sidney
Aim for the moon. If you miss you may hit a star. W. Clement Stone
Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me. Carol Burnett
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows. Ralph Marston
If you can dream it you can do it. Walt Disney
Good. better. best. Never let it rest. ‘Til your good is better and your better is best. St. Jerome
Problems are not stop signs; they are guidelines. Robert H. Schuller
Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done. It’s always your choice. Wayne Dyer
There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving and that’s your own self. Aldous Huxley
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. Confucius
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. Thomas A. Edison
Always do your best. What you plant now. You will harvest later. Og Mandino
Well done is better than well said. Benjamin Franklin
Never give up. For that is just the place and time that the tide will turn. Harriet Beecher Stowe
Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting. Christopher Morley
Love For All. Hatred For None. Khalifatul Masih III
Change the world by being yourself. Amy Poehler
Every moment is a fresh beginning. T.S Eliot
Never regret anything that made you smile. Mark Twain
Die with memories. Not dreams. Unknown
Aspire to inspire before we expire. Unknown
Everything you can imagine is real. Pablo Picasso
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. Leonardo da Vinci
Whatever you do. Do it well. Walt Disney
What we think. We become. Buddha
All limitations are self-imposed. Oliver Wendell Holmes
Tough times never last but tough people do. Robert H. Schiuller
Problems are not stop signs
column4: they are guidelines. – Robert H. Schiuller

column3: One day the people that don’t even believe in you will tell everyone how they met you. – Johnny Depp
If I’m gonna tell a real story
column4: I’m gonna start with my name. – Kendrick Lamar

column3: If you tell the truth you don’t have to remember anything. – Mark Twain
Have enough courage to start and enough heart to finish. – Jessica N. S. Yourko
Hate comes from intimidation
I could agree with you but then we’d both be wrong. – Harvey Specter
if you don’t stay behind. – Dr. Seuss
